source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,988 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,988 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 21,947 Agility for 15 sec.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
